Array: * I am not your enemy,^05 but an\n  average mole.
* I would like to add a bit\n  of flavor to your experience.
* Or would a bit of advice be\n  more useful to you...?
* I'm willing to help either way!
* It's a bit jarring to see the\n  enemies in battle appearing <color=#FF0000FF>RED</color>\n  instead of the usual WHITE.
* When they're <color=#FF0000FF>HOSTILE</color>,^05 they\n  won't even consider mercy\n  until you calm them down.
* Some will snap out of it when\n  they reach a certain point of\n  health,^05 but some won't.
* That means some enemies won't\n  become sparable at low enough\n  health.
* So you better be willing to\n  talk if you wanna get by\n  without hurting them.
* That being said,^05 if a hostile\n  enemy is <color=#00A2E8FF>TIRED</color>,^05 you can still\n  make it fall asleep.
* If you can find out how\n  to do that,^05 that is.
